long_description: The shortest of the SkirtSport skorts, the Marathon Chick skirt is great for endurance races and warm-weather workouts where you want lots of freedom to move and a high amount of breathability. Soft, lightweight polyester fabric wicks moisture away from skin to keep you dry and cool; fabric dries quickly so you can wash and wear it again in no time. Marathon Chick skirt features breathable, full-coverage briefs that provide lightweight, chafe-free comfort. Wide waistband lies flat against skin, offering a smooth profile and comfortable fit. Generous 5 in. zippered pocket on middle back of waistband accommodates keys, ID, media player or a few energy gels for your long runs. Closeout.
short_description: The shortest of the SkirtSport skorts, the Marathon Chick skirt is great for endurance races and warm-weather workouts where you want lots of freedom to move and a high amount of breathability.
